t: Amazon.com : Daim Bar pack of 3 x 28g : Grocery & Gourmet Food
s: The Daim chocolate bar itself is simply a thin, flat layer of hard, crunchy caramel covered in milk chocolate. It's the taste and texture of the caramel that makes Daim a bit different from other bars though. It's very hard and crunchy almost like a hard toffee and has tiny flakes of almond ...

t: Daim bar - Wikipedia
s: 2 weeks ago - It was renamed "Daim" in most countries in 1990, although it continued to be marketed in the United Kingdom and Ireland as Dime. The brand was purchased by the American company Kraft Foods in 1993 and is now held by Mondelez International, which Kraft spun off in 2012.
